name: Subway Run - Deadly Traps
description:
DASH as fast as you can!

DODGE the deadly traps!
JUMP over the spikes!
FLY to collecting maximum coins!

This is our story:
You are a Vampire. You need darkness. You scare the sun and human.
Try to run to the castle before sun rises.
But beware of the Subway Village villagers.
They'll try to kill you. They set deadly traps along the way.

Features:
- Colorful and stunning HD graphics!
- Vampire, Hulk, Goblin, Farm Girl
- Jetpack flying
- Many types of traps, obstacles
- Turn corner, not only run straight
- Upgrade your abilities or buy new characters
- Challenge and help your friends!
- Game Center achievements and leaderboards.
